title: Secret Information Exchange
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>I see.... So there’s a method like that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Was that helpful to you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yes, very! Thank you, Eli-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I’m glad. But aren’t you also knowledgeable on stretching, Karin? Why did you ask me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You have experience in ballet, right? I’m just an amateur whose knowledge comes from books and the internet. There’s no reason not to ask someone who knows more<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>....Is that what it was?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>That’s what it was. With this, I could teach Kanata and Rina-chan properly<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, what a good senior<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I’ve been helped by everyone, so I’m giving back what I can. With that said, what do you want me to do in return, Eli-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Well, then I won’t hold back, let’s go shopping after this. I want a pair of boots, and I want you to pick one with your sense of style, Karin♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
